abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column shares recipes for vegetable soups.

headline.print_headline: Vegetable Soups Built for Maximum Flavor
headline.main: Vegetable Soups Built for Maximum Flavor

snippet: Three recipes to get you through the rest of winter, using a few simple techniques to add depth in the pot. (Article plus video.)
lead_paragraph: Three recipes to get you through the rest of winter, using a few simple techniques to add depth in the pot. (Article plus video.)
